OpenAPI User Stories Erik Wilde, OAI Ambassador: APIs and OpenAPI in the Age of AI

(6) WIIFM: Business and Organization Value

As business or organization leader
I want well-defined and usable digital interfaces for partners and the public
so that I can more easily change and scale my value streams.


OpenAPI User Stories Erik Wilde, OAI Ambassador: APIs and OpenAPI in the Age of AI

(7) WIIFM: API Developers

As an API developer
I want to describe the product I am going to implement
so that I can use various tools throughout the API lifecycle.


OpenAPI User Stories Erik Wilde, OAI Ambassador: APIs and OpenAPI in the Age of AI

(8) WIIFM: API Consumers

As an API consumer
I want APIs to have standardized descriptions
so that I can easily understand and consume the products I am accessing.


OpenAPI User Stories Erik Wilde, OAI Ambassador: APIs and OpenAPI in the Age of AI

(9) WIIFM: Platform People

As an API platform person
I want to support standardized description formats
so that all producers and consumers speak in the same language.

(11) What AI Needs?



APIs for AI Consumers Erik Wilde, OAI Ambassador: APIs and OpenAPI in the Age of AI

(12) OpenAPI: A Robust Foundation

Feature Enables
Paths, operations, schemas Machine-readable contract
Parameters & examples Additional interaction details
Tags & grouping Basic categorization
Security schemes Authentication and authorization setup
External docs Human-oriented documentation
Links Basic flow hints (since OpenAPI 3.0)


APIs for AI Consumers Erik Wilde, OAI Ambassador: APIs and OpenAPI in the Age of AI

(13) What



APIs for AI Consumers Erik Wilde, OAI Ambassador: APIs and OpenAPI in the Age of AI

(14) OpenAPI Extensions for AI Consumers

  • Specific API information to surface for AI tooling and/or AI consumers
  • Example: What would help to generate better MCP servers?


APIs for AI Consumers Erik Wilde, OAI Ambassador: APIs and OpenAPI in the Age of AI

(15) OpenAPI AI Maturity Levels

  • Assess the AI-readiness of your API landscape
  • Example: API discovery; API granularity; API workflows

AI-based APIs Erik Wilde, OAI Ambassador: APIs and OpenAPI in the Age of AI

(17) OpenAPI Extensions for AI APIs

  • Any information that relates to APIs using AI technologies
  • Example: Where does data go and is it used for model training?

AI Practices for APIs Erik Wilde, OAI Ambassador: APIs and OpenAPI in the Age of AI

(19) OpenAPI AI Agent Maturity Levels

  • Guidance on how to make API easily consumable for AI Agents
  • Example: Are your APIs ready for automated agent onboarding?
